pages.text: Welcome to PneumaticCraft!$(li)Get some $(thing)Iron/$ and some $(thing)Stone/$.  You'll want around a stack of each (maybe a bit less iron) to start with.$(li)Throw your iron on the ground, and blow it up. Yes, really.$(li)Collect the resulting $(thing)Compressed Iron/$ (a little will be lost in the explosion).$(li)Make some $(l:tubes/pressure_tubes)Pressure Tubes/$.$(li)Make some $(l:base_concepts/building_materials)Reinforced Stone/$.$(li)Build a $(l:manufacturing/pressure_chamber)Pressure Chamber/$.
自此之後，該手冊的更多部分將會解鎖，基於你在$(pncr)的發展過程中達成的的$(thing)進度/$。查看該模組的進度頁獲取下一步發展的指導（完成某些進度也會給予$(thing)經驗/$，算是錦上添花）。
